title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 2
body:
NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 2


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Fighting, 3D
Companies: CyberConnect2 / Namco Bandai Games
Languages: ENG/MULTI5
Original Size: 6.7 GB
Repack Size: from 2.9 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on NARUTO.SHIPPUDEN.Ultimate.Ninja.STORM.2-CODEX ISO release: codex-naruto.shippuden.ultimate.ninja.storm.2.iso (7,217,709,056 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when install with both languages)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of Japanese videos/voiceovers
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 6.7 to 2.9~3.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~20 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~30 minutes on 4-cores CPU; ~50 minutes on 2-cores CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 8 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 2 is a tour de force of Naruto thrills and spills. Impressively faithful to the universe of the anime, the game takes players through the Naruto Shippuden story arc with new battle systems enhancing the gameplay. Players must choose the right companions to fight alongside and together unleash explosive Team Special Techniques to lay waste to opponents. Ultimate Ninja STORM 2 has been remastered in HD.
